title: Abdulwaheed Afolabi
text:
Abdulwaheed Afolabi (born December 8, 1991) is a Nigerian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> is presently playing for <a href="Plateau%20United%20F.C.">Plateau United</a> in the Nigeria Premier League also representing Nigeria in the Caf champions league qualification 2018. Abdulwaheed has played for Russian Premier League team <a href="FC%20Kuban%20Krasnodar">Kuban Krasnodar</a> and Ukraine Premier League team <a href="SC%20Tavriya%20Simferopol">Tavriya Simferopol</a>. He has earned 14 caps and scored 3 goals for the Nigeria national youth teams.
Career.
Afolabi went on trial with <a href="Black%20Leopards%20F.C.">Black Leopards</a> of the South African <a href="Premier%20Soccer%20League">Premier Soccer League</a> in August 2011, but negotiations broke down and he returned to <a href="Niger%20Tornadoes%20F.C.">Niger Tornadoes</a>.
In March 2012, Afolabi signed a two-year contract with <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> side <a href="SC%20Tavriya%20Simferopol">Tavriya Simferopol</a>. Afolabi then transferred to <a href="Russian%20Premier%20League">Russian Premier League</a> side <a href="FC%20Kuban%20Krasnodar">Kuban Krasnodar</a> in August 2012, signing a four-year contract.
Afolabi made his debut for Kubam on 30 November 2012 in a game against <a href="FC%20Krasnodar">FC Krasnodar</a>.
In May 2017, Afolabi signing for <a href="Gombe%20United%20F.C.">Gombe United</a>.
